name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】歌に謎解きにホラーあり！？こよりらしさを詰め込んだライブ！ - THE KOYORI - 【 #博衣こより1周年 ⧸ホロライブ】 [aLgQxWOWEnw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Hakui Koyori performs the song 'Tori no Uta' in a coastal town setting. She eventually grows wings and flies into the sky.

subtitles.original: いつまでも変わらずに いられなかったこと
subtitles.english: The fact that I couldn't stay the same forever
that I let go of your fingers

subtitles.original: あの鳥はまだ うまく飛べないけど
subtitles.english: That bird still can't fly well, but

subtitles.original: いつかは風を切って知る
subtitles.english: someday it will know as it cuts through the wind

subtitles.original: 届かない場所が まだ遠くにある
subtitles.english: The place I can't reach is still far away

subtitles.original: 願いだけ秘めて 見つめてる
subtitles.english: Keeping only my wish hidden, I'm watching

subtitles.original: 子供たちは 夏の線路 歩く
subtitles.english: Children walk along the summer tracks

subtitles.original: 吹く風に 素足をさらして
subtitles.english: Exposing their bare feet to the blowing wind

subtitles.original: 遠くには 幼かった日々を
subtitles.english: In the distance, those childhood days
